centurions_resolve.name: Centurion's Resolve
centurions_resolve.desc: Your Legion Kata attacks deal 10% more damage.

wind_step.name: Wind Step
wind_step.desc: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air. Jumping while sliding down a slope or off a cliff launches you forwards. (5s combat CD, 1s normal CD)

air_pressure.name: Air Pressure
air_pressure.desc: Dodging an attack or hitting an enemy's block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.

pressure_break_agl.name: Pressure Break [AGL]
pressure_break_agl.desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

pressure_break_str.name: Pressure Break [STR]
pressure_break_str.desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

cyclone_blade.name: Cyclone Blade
cyclone_blade.desc: After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your weapon in wind essence causing your next Light attack to do bleed damage, and adding +10% chip damage.
